Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Houston in 1990...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1992, off Cecilio Guante (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1992, off Roger Clemens (CHC)...
Injured on 8/29/1992 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/29/1993 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P R. Clemens, LF G. Vaughn, 2B M. McGwire. Going to CHC: 1B J. Thome, RF J. Gonzalez, RF R. Greer, P D. Wells, C E. Wedge)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Pittsburgh on 5/12/1994 (Going to PIT: 1B J. Thome, LF R. Greer. Going to CHC: 1B D. Ortiz, 2B T. Graffanino, CF G. Matthews Jr.)...
